QuestData.Title: Pamela's Doll
QuestData.Description: My auntie Marlene told me to stay here in our house because my father had to go and fight. My father's the bravest man in the whole world!$B$BBut I've been here for a long time, and he hasn't come for me. Sometimes bad people come and whisper to me and I want my dad to make them go away, but he's not here!$B$BAnd sometimes when it gets dark I want to play with my doll but I can't because I left it in town.$B$BWill you find my doll for me?
QuestData.RewardText: You found it! You found my doll! Oh, thank you!
